si_extensions.name: core
si_extensions.description: Core part of SimpleInvoices - always enabled

si_preferences.pref_inv_detail_line: Payment is to be made within 14 days of the invoice being sent

This transaction has been paid in full, please keep this receipt as proof of purchase.
Thank you

This is an estimate of the final value of services rendered.
Thank you

This is a quote of the final value of services rendered.
Thank you

si_sql_patchmanager.sql_statement: CREATE TABLE si_sql_patchmanager (sql_id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY ,sql_patch_ref VARCHAR( 50 ) NOT NULL ,sql_patch VARCHAR( 255 ) NOT NULL ,sql_release VARCHAR( 25 ) NOT NULL ,sql_statement TEXT NOT NULL) ENGINE = MYISAM
UPDATE si_extensions SET id = 0 WHERE name = core LIMIT 1

si_sql_patchmanager.sql_patch: Set domain_id on system defaults table to 1
Set extension_id on system defaults table to 1
Move all old consulting style invoices to itemized
si_sql_patchmanager.sql_statement: UPDATE si_invoices SET type_id = 2 where type_id = 3
ALTER TABLE si_customers ADD COLUMN department VARCHAR(255) NULL AFTER name

si_sql_patchmanager.sql_patch: Add User Security enhancement fields and values
si_sql_patchmanager.sql_statement: ALTER TABLE `si_user` ADD `username` VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT '' NOT NULL AFTER `id`;

si_sql_patchmanager.sql_patch: Add Signature field to the biller table.
si_sql_patchmanager.sql_statement: ALTER TABLE `si_biller` ADD `signature` varchar(255) DEFAULT '' NOT NULL AFTER `email`;

si_sql_patchmanager.sql_patch: Add check number field to the payment table.
si_sql_patchmanager.sql_statement: ALTER TABLE `si_payment` ADD `ac_check_number` varchar(10) DEFAULT '' NOT NULL COMMENT 'Check number for CHECK payment types';
CREATE TABLE `si_install_complete` (`completed` tinyint(1) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Flag SI install has completed') ENGINE=InnoDB COMMENT='Specifies an allowed setting for a flag field';

si_sql_patchmanager.sql_patch: Add last_activity_date, aging_date and aging_value to invoices.
si_sql_patchmanager.sql_statement: ALTER TABLE `si_invoices` ADD `last_activity_date` DATETIME DEFAULT '2000-12-31 00:00:00' NOT NULL COMMENT 'Date last activity update to the invoice', ADD `aging_date` DATETIME DEFAULT '2000-12-30 00:00:00' NOT NULL COMMENT 'Date aging was last calculated', ADD `age_days` SMALLINT(5) UNSIGNED DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL COMMENT 'Age of invoice balance', ADD `aging` VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT '' NOT NULL COMMENT 'Aging string (1-14, 15-30, etc.'; DELETE IGNORE FROM `si_system_defaults` WHERE `name` = 'large_dataset';
ALTER TABLE `si_invoices` ADD COLUMN `owing` DECIMAL(25,6) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL COMMENT 'Amount owing as of aging-date' AFTER `note`;UPDATE `si_invoices` SET `owing` = 1;

si_sql_patchmanager.sql_patch: Add invoice custom field report extension to standard application and add sales_representative field.
si_sql_patchmanager.sql_statement: ALTER TABLE `si_invoices` ADD `sales_representative` VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT '' NOT NULL;

si_sql_patchmanager.sql_patch: Add default_invoice field to the customers table.
si_sql_patchmanager.sql_statement: ALTER TABLE `si_customers` ADD `default_invoice` INT(10) UNSIGNED DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL COMMENT 'Invoice index_id value to use as the default template' AFTER `notes`;

si_sql_patchmanager.sql_patch: Add expense tables to the database.
si_sql_patchmanager.sql_statement: CREATE TABLE `si_expense` (id INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT UNIQUE KEY, domain_id INT(11) NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(25,6) NOT NULL, expense_account_id INT(11) NOT NULL, biller_id INT(11) NOT NULL, customer_id INT(11) NOT NULL, invoice_id INT(11) NOT NULL, product_id INT(11) NOT NULL, date DATE NOT NULL, note TEXT NOT NULL) ENGINE = InnoDb;
